content.text: Hi, I'm Matt, nice to meet you!
Hello! Nice to meet you too! My name is Sarah.
I'm from California, but I live in Texas now.
Oh wow, that's a big change! What made you move?
I got a job offer here that I couldn't pass up.
Thanks! What about you, where are you from?
I'm from New York, but I've lived in a few different places.
Oh cool! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, travel, and spend time with my friends and family.
Those all sound like fun things to do! I love to travel too. Where's your favorite place you've ever been?
I love Paris! I went there on my honeymoon and it was amazing.
Paris is on my bucket list! It looks like such a beautiful city.
It is! You should definitely go one day.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! I hope you have a great day, Sarah.
